      • getConfigModel

        public org.switchyard.config.model.switchyard.SwitchYardModel getConfigModel()
        Get the configuration model driving this test instance, if one exists.

        An abstract deployment is created if no configuration model is supplied on construction.

        Returns:
        The config model, or null if no config model was used to construct the TestCase instance.

      • replaceService

        public MockHandler replaceService(String name)
                           throws SwitchYardException
        Replaces an existing service registration (e.g. reference binding) with a test handler using the same contract as the existing service provider. If multiple services are registered with the specified name, the first one found is used. Generally speaking, it's not a good idea to use this method if you have multiple services registered with the same name. In that situation, use the removeService() and registerService() methods instead.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the service to replace
        Returns:
        mock service handler representing the service provider
        Throws:
        SwitchYardException - if a service with the specified name does not exist

      • replaceService

        public void replaceService(String name,
                  ExchangeHandler handler)
                    throws SwitchYardException
        Replaces an existing service registration (e.g. reference binding) with a test handler using the same contract as the existing service provider. If multiple services are registered with the specified name, the first one found is used. Generally speaking, it's not a good idea to use this method if you have multiple services registered with the same name. In that situation, use the removeService() and registerService() methods instead.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the service to replace
        handler - implementation to use as the service provider
        Throws:
        SwitchYardException - if a service with the specified name does not exist

      • replaceService

        public MockHandler replaceService(QName name)
                           throws SwitchYardException
        Replaces an existing service registration (e.g. reference binding) with a test handler using the same contract as the existing service provider. If multiple services are registered with the specified name, the first one found is used. Generally speaking, it's not a good idea to use this method if you have multiple services registered with the same name. In that situation, use the removeService() and registerService() methods instead.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the service to replace
        Returns:
        mock service handler representing the service provider
        Throws:
        SwitchYardException - if a service with the specified name does not exist

      • replaceService

        public void replaceService(QName name,
                  ExchangeHandler handler)
                    throws SwitchYardException
        Replaces an existing service registration (e.g. reference binding) with a test handler using the same contract as the existing service provider. If multiple services are registered with the specified name, the first one found is used. Generally speaking, it's not a good idea to use this method if you have multiple services registered with the same name. In that situation, use the removeService() and registerService() methods instead.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the service to replace
        handler - implementation to use as the service provider
        Throws:
        SwitchYardException - if a service with the specified name does not exist

      • newInvoker

        public Invoker newInvoker(String serviceName)
        Create a new Invoker instance for invoking a Service in the test ServiceDomain.
        Parameters:
        serviceName - The target Service name. Can be a serialized QName. Can also include the operation name e.g. "OrderManagementService.createOrder".
        Returns:
        The invoker instance.

      • getMixIn

        public <T extends TestMixIn> T getMixIn(Class<T> type)
        Get the "active" TestMixIn instance of the specified type.

        This method can only be called from inside a test method.

        Type Parameters:
        T - type TestMixIn type.
        Parameters:
        type - The TestMixIn type, as specified in the SwitchYardTestCaseConfig annotation.
        Returns:
        The TestMixIn instance.

        Parameters:
        mixIn - Mix in asking about dependencies.
        Returns:
        Dependencies which are mandatory for mixin

      • getResourceAsStream

        public InputStream getResourceAsStream(String name)
        Finds a resource with a given name.

        Searches relative to the implementing class definition.

        Parameters:
        name - Name of the desired resource
        Returns:
        A InputStream object or null if no resource with this name is found.
        See Also:
        Classes.getResourceAsStream(String,Class)

      • readResourceBytes

        public byte[] readResourceBytes(String path)
        Read a classpath resource and return as a byte array.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the classpath resource. The specified path can be relative to the test class' location on the classpath.
        Returns:
        The resource as an array of bytes.

      • compareXMLToResource

        public void compareXMLToResource(String xml,
                        String resourcePath)
        Compare an XML string (e.g. a result) against a classpath resource.
        Parameters:
        xml - The XML (as a String) to be compared against the XML in the specified classpath resource.
        resourcePath - The path to the classpath resource against which the XML is to be compared. The specified path can be relative to the test class' location on the classpath.

                      String string)
        Compare an XML String (e.g. a result) against another String.
        Parameters:
        xml - The XML (as a String) to be compared against the XML in the specified classpath resource.
        string - The String against which the XML is to be compared.
